Prompt: "EduConnect" System Requirements

You are tasked with developing an academic collaboration platform, "EduConnect." The system must meet the following functional requirements:

1. ğŸ”‘ Authentication & User Roles

  • Implement a secure, role-based login system.
  • Define two distinct user roles: Teacher and Student.
  • User dashboards and permissions must be dependent on the logged-in user's role.

2. ğŸ“š Assignment Management

  • Teachers: Must be able to create, post, and update assignments (including title, description, due date, and file attachments).
  • Students: Must be able to view all posted assignments and submit their work (via file upload or text input).

3. ğŸ“ Grading & Feedback System

  • Teachers: Must have a module to view all student submissions for a specific assignment.
  • Teachers: Must be able to assign a grade and provide personalized, real-time written feedback for each submission.
  • Students: Must be able to view their grades and the feedback provided by the teacher.

4. ğŸ’¬ Communication & Discussion

  • Implement a central discussion forum or Q&A board.
  • Students: Must be able to post questions.
  • Teachers (and other students): Must be able to reply to questions, creating threaded discussions.

5. ğŸ“ File & Resource Sharing

  • Provide a module for teachers to upload and share study materials (e.g., lecture notes, PDFs, links).
  • Students must be able to access and download these shared materials.

6. ğŸ”” Notification System

  • Implement an automated notification system to alert users of important events.
  • Student alerts: New assignment posted, new grade received, reply to their discussion post, and upcoming deadlines.
  • Teacher alerts: New assignment submission received, new question posted in the Q&A forum.
